action_item: Topics - Discuss the billing process in Dr. Cloud EHR and creating claims.
notes: Focus on marking claims as billed without sending to a clearinghouse.

action_item: Reports - Update the rate tables and master charge list in Dr. Cloud EHR.
notes: Ensure usual and customary rates are accurate.

action_item: Requirements - Handle special billing scenarios using billing rules.
notes: Consider age of the client and diagnoses based on service codes.

action_item: Appointment Types - Discuss the process for handling authorizations.
Payers - Review the contract management for payers' contracted rates.
notes: Ensure editing capabilities in Dr. Cloud EHR.

action_item: Data Migration - Ensure the system can generate claims based on filters.
notes: Filters should include authorization status, bill type, and service code.

action_item: Users & Roles - Set up notifications for claims not generated due to missing information.
notes: Modify claim rules for each payer and service code.

action_item: Service Codes - Manage rate tables for CPT-4 codes.
notes: Edit rates based on date ranges and service codes.

action_item: Key Question - Determine the requirements for sending encounters to Medicaid authority.
Reaction - Address concerns about claims generation failures due to missing prior authorization.
notes: Implement checks for prior authorization status.

action_item: Topics - Discuss the process for placing clients with collection agencies.
notes: Utilize the collections aging report for outstanding balances.

action_item: Reports - Export accounting transactions for general ledger.
notes: Ensure transactions are accurately reflected in the export.
